column5: Hi guys just a heads up and to get off the musky topic, I hear from my local shop, Bills Bait, that Shimano has dropped all their prices by 30%, Too bad I just purchased a couple tekotas already this spring, I don't know what other shops have done, but Greg and Tim have dropped the price on their inventory already, and supposedly this not sale but a change in pricing strategy
Le Barons dropped their prices a while ago.
They have the new Curado 50E @ $218. That's a damn good price considering it's selling for $199 in the US.  http://www.lebaron.ca/pdffiles/web_feat/shimano_curadoTDR_web.pdf
just called lebaron but they don't have any lefties yet ARGH!  Attractive price point
It's about time they adjusted their prices to reflect our dollars strength when comparing it to the american greenback.
The last time I was at lebarons both shimano and g-loomis were on sale
GL 30% off from catalog Shimano 25% off All good stuff are gone already. Lebaron is awesome.
So are we going to see this price reduction throughout Ontario, make that Canada????  I definitely NEED, want...no NEED a few ice fishing reels!
